page.title: 08INDUSTRY (Andrew Antenna)
page.content:
....were qualified in engineering and tele-communications.
The firm chose this site because it was an area free from tall buildings and air routes, all of which might distort transmission testing. 95% of its 220 employees live locally. The firm has good training programme and actively recruit girls as engineers.
The firm see their future expanding in sales from satellite television.At the present it would cost about Â£100 for a small antenna for your back garden which along with a new kind of television would allow you to get pictures via satellite.
The 'Terrestrial' was used during the Olympic Games to send back pictures from America to our television (cont)
